game.name: RE:AKTOR
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: RE:AKTOR is a metroidvania action platformer where you can roll back time. Find and install drivers to unlock your lost abilities. Run and fight your way through a branching underground facility. Rewind time to beat the clock, and stop a great cataclysm.
game.shortDescriptionEn: RE:AKTOR is a metroidvania action platformer where you can roll back time. Find and install drivers to unlock your lost abilities. Run and fight your way through a branching underground facility. Rewind time to beat the clock, and stop a great cataclysm.
